item.title: Statistical Analysis Plans (StAPs)
item.description: Overview Statistical Analysis Plans (StAPs) were introduced at INBO in october 2025. This page gathers all information you need to write your own StAP. For now, we provide the slides for the lessons that have been given and the latest template to download. In the future, we will add recordings of the classes and a step-by-step procedure to start, make, and review your StAP Lessons Module 1 Slides lesson 1 Slides lesson 2
